verbose_text: Approximately, 2 g of dried samples were weighed in a porcelain crucible of 50 mL; 7.5 mL of magnesium nitrate solution at 6.67% w/v were added to each sample to prevent volatilization of Pb.
evidence: mL of magnesium nitrate solution at 6.67% w/v were added to each sample to prevent volatilization of Pb
